pages.text: The class tree is a branching system that helps you create your ideal playstyle, much like a classic role playing game. $(br2)The tree is split into three branches: $(br)$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/freeman_classes)Freeman$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_classes)Mage$()$(li)$(l:the_class_tree/soldier_classes)Soldier$()

Within each branch there are a seven classes: $(br)$(li)1 Tier One$(li)2 Tier Two$(li)4 Tier Three $(br2)Each class is mutually exclusive. If you pick any, you will need to reset it before you can pick another.

The token is used to unlock new powers and advance through the class tree. You can earn these by reaching total level milestones in PMMO. $(br2)$(l)DO NOT LOSE THESE$(). They can only be replaced by an admin or creative player.

You can earn a total of 37 tokens through normal gameplay. $(br2)$(o)$(m)There may be more hidden in a questline.$()$(br2)Due to how the class tree is created, using FTB Teams will break the progression. $(br2)The buttons have been removed to prevent this.
$(br2)$(br2)$(br2)The following pages will list the classes and tiers within each branch, with their linking pages in other chapters.
